text.page:
371
102-186a @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nyA bar+d+ha nI nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ shes rab skyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA

372
102-186b ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satrA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ tad+ya thA/ s+kha la te sla la te ma ni te swA hA/ rig sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ khyor chu la lan gsum bzlas te 'thungs na zhag bdun nas thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab skyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang / lots+tsha ba ban+de klu'i dbang pos bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra siM ha dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de de ba tsan+d+ras zhus te gtan la yab pa// //
